name: Tank vs Turrets
description:
Welcome to Tank vs Turrets! 

Destroy the towers with your tank to save your teammate!

Use your minimap where the turrets hide!

Your Tank does 10 damage!

Normal Turret: 50 HP

Machinegun Turret: 100 HP


Sniper Turret: 250HP

Boss: 400 HP

Controls:

Use "W A S D" to move and "mouse" for camera to shoot.

Gameplay Video:

By Emre Özdemir
